name: Dungeons of Doctor Creep
overview: The passion for caving has always haunted you throughout your life, even throwing you into strange and dangerous situations. This time, while spelunking you have found ancient underground tunnels in which an evil scientist is hiding. Seeing this evil quack's actions fill you with bile and a desire for true justice you venture into the dark corridors in search of the secret laboratory to destroy it. You will have to pay close attention to the lightning-throwers, machines which can be turned off but are very dangerous when active. Beware the pitfalls scattered everywhere and the evil robots who guard the residence of the mad scientist, Doctor Creep. Published at least 20 times in various Italian publications under the name Instant in I Magnifici 5 & 7 n.13 (maggio 1986) and Hit Parade C64 n.53 (Febbraio 1991), but it did appear in those other publications under names such as Guss, Pluck, Bitter, Plight, Hope, Inpect , Double and Shades.
